CONTENT: マンガとかでは学校の屋上でサボっている生徒を見かけるけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En los mangas, es normal ver a estudiantes en la azotea saltándose las clases,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not uncommon to see students skipping class on the rooftop in manga and such,

CONTENT: 屋上で昼寝なんかしたら肌が日差しに焼けて大変だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero si te echaras un rato allí, acabarías quemándote por el sol.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but if you actually took a nap up there, you'd get a sunburn like no other.

CONTENT: 教室では そろそろ3時間目の授業が始まる頃か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que está a punto de empezar la tercera hora.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think third period is about to start for everyone else.

CONTENT: 授業をサボりがちな私とほとんど学校に来ていなかった安達は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo siempre hacía pellas y Adachi apenas veía a clase.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I pretty much always skipped classes, and Adachi rarely ever came to school.

CONTENT: 偶然 ここで会って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We happened to meet up here by chance,

CONTENT: 何となく 行動を共にすることが多くなった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y acabamos pasando un montón de tiempo juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and ended up spending a lot of time together.

CONTENT: 次 私のサーブでいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you mind if I serve next?

CONTENT: いいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure?

CONTENT: えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: 昨日ネットで調べてきたサーブ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aprendí a hacer ese servicio por internet.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I found out how to do that serve online.

CONTENT: ラケットなんかないからしゃもじで練習したんだけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como no tengo paleta en casa, practiqué con una de cocina.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I didn't have a racket at home, so I practiced with a rice paddle.

CONTENT: 汚い 素人相手に変化球使うなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es justo usar una bola curva contra una principiante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No fair using curveballs on amateurs like me.

CONTENT: 向上心のないしまむらが悪い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te falta ambición, pequeña Shimamura. Y no es culpa mía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You lack ambition, young Shimamura. And that's not my... fault!

CONTENT: こうして サボっているときも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When we're skipping class like this,

CONTENT: 何となく相手が ここに来ている感覚があって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: normalmente sabemos si la otra está aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we can usually sense if the other is here.

CONTENT: 来てみると本当にいたりする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And we usually find each other up here.

CONTENT: やりますか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's do this!

CONTENT: もし上 来ちゃったらどうする?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que tocaba Educación Física a tercera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess third period was PE class.

CONTENT: 窓開けてさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What if they come up here?

CONTENT: 飛び降りて逃げようか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't we open the windows and jump?

CONTENT: ええっ ここ 2階だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! But we're on the second floor!

CONTENT: 足折れない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wouldn't we break our legs?

CONTENT: 安達はカルシウムが不足してると
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo que a tu dieta le falta calcio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, I see that you lack calcium in your diet.

CONTENT: その解釈 何か嫌なんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me gusta esa forma de verlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I really don't like that interpretation.

CONTENT: やっばい ドキドキしてる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Crap. This is sorta exciting.

CONTENT: でも 気づかれてないみたいだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No creo que se den cuenta de que estamos aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think they realize we're up here, though.

CONTENT: 今日のお昼ご飯 たまには牛乳でも飲もうかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que hoy beberé leche con el almuerzo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe I'll just drink some milk with my lunch today.

CONTENT: 飛び降りても足が折れないように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así no me romperé las piernas cuando salte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So my legs don't break if we ever have to jump.

CONTENT: そっか　安達は骨を鍛えることにしたと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. Has decidido fortalecer tus huesos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. So you've decided to strengthen your bones.

CONTENT: 色んなことに翻弄されないこの時間は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los ratos que pasamos juntas en los que no importaba nada más
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This time we spent together where nothing else mattered

CONTENT: 居心地が良くて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: always felt so nice.

CONTENT: ああっ もう無理!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ugh, I can't anymore.

CONTENT: 暑い!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's so hot!

CONTENT: 外出る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wanna go outside?

CONTENT: 昼休み もうすぐだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya casi es la hora de comer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's almost lunchtime anyway.

CONTENT: まあ はしたない　ウチの高校の...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My, how lewd. Our school's...

CONTENT: えっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um...

CONTENT: 品位のこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dignity?

CONTENT: それそれ 下がるザマス
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso es. Te estás jugando la dignidad del insti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, that! Our school's dignity is at stake here.

CONTENT: で 昼休みか どうしよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya es la hora de comer. ¿Qué hago?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's lunchtime, but what should I do?

CONTENT: はいはい　その乱れまくった格好じゃね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, no podemos sacarte en estas condiciones.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, yeah. We can't have you go out in that state.

CONTENT: 私が行けばいいんでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll just go.

CONTENT: 次は 私が行くから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll go next time.

CONTENT: その次は 私の考える次と全然噛み合わないんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos conceptos muy distintos de \"la próxima vez\".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You and I always seem to have different opinions about \"next time.\"

CONTENT: いつものデニッシュパンと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya sé que quieres el pan de siempre,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, you probably want your usual danish,

CONTENT: 今日は牛乳にする?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but do you want milk today?

CONTENT: 水
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Water, please.

CONTENT: 分かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Roger.

CONTENT: 安達と悪いことを共有するのは適度に楽しい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me divierte hacer cosas malas con Adachi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Doing bad things with Adachi is pretty fun.

CONTENT: 相手が安達だからはまったのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Será porque me he acostumbrado a hacerlas con ella
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it because I got hooked doing this with Adachi,

CONTENT: それとも単に いけないことをしている感覚に酔っているのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: o porque me gusta hacer ese tipo de travesuras?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: or do I just get a rush doing bad things?

CONTENT: 答えは すぐ出るけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The answer's obvious, but...

CONTENT: 今は ぼやかしておこう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero dejaré las ambigüedades de momento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll leave things ambiguous for now.

CONTENT: 何やってるんだか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is she even doing?

CONTENT: 体育館の2階にいたのはしまむらが先だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ella fue la primera en llegar a la segunda planta del gimnasio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura was the first one to be up here on the second floor of the gymnasium.

CONTENT: 雰囲気が中学生みたいで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parecía como si estuviera en secundaria,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She still looked like a middle schooler,

CONTENT: 多分 同じ1年生だろうなとは予想できた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que supuse que estaba en primero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I figured she was a first-year like me.

CONTENT: 《あっ 安達だった?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-Adachi, was it?

CONTENT: 《そう だけど》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah?

CONTENT: 《えっと 同じクラス》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, we're in the same class.

CONTENT: 《あっ うん》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, right.

CONTENT: 《あだ名はひらがなで しまむら》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My nickname's Shimamura, but in hiragana.

CONTENT: 《しまむら》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura...

CONTENT: 《ここの常連なの?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you come here often?

CONTENT: 《今日は たまたまそっちは?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just happened to stop by today. What about you?

CONTENT: 《似たようなもの》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Pretty much the same.

CONTENT: 《うるさいねえ》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're so loud.

CONTENT: 《ホント》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right?

CONTENT: 《あっ!》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh.

CONTENT: 《触れるの?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you able to touch them?

CONTENT: 《セミなら何とか》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cicadas aren't too bad.

CONTENT: 《止まれるかな?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Think it'll stay on?

CONTENT: 《あと何日くらい生きるのかな》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How many days do you think it has left?

CONTENT: 《分かんない》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I dunno.

CONTENT: 《だよね》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah...

CONTENT: 《何日くらい 生きてほしい?》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How much longer do you want it to live?

CONTENT: 《15日 何となく》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fifteen days... I think.

CONTENT: それから15日後
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fifteen days later,

CONTENT: 2階にやってきたしまむらの手は土で汚れていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura tenía las manos llenas de barro cuando llegó al gimnasio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura's hands were covered in dirt when she came up to the second floor.

CONTENT: そうして 私はしまむらと出会った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aquel fue mi primer encuentro con Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That was my first encounter with Shimamura.

CONTENT: 安達!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi!

CONTENT: デニッシュパン最後の1個だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te he traído el último pan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I got you the last danish.

CONTENT: それと 水
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here's your water.

CONTENT: ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks.

CONTENT: まだ しまむらを友達とも思っていなかったときの話だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aquello pasó cuando todavía no me consideraba su amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This was still when I didn't consider Shimamura my friend yet.

CONTENT: あるもんだ　たっかぁ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hoy en día hay libros para todo, pero qué caro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess they have a book for everything. Dang, that's expensive.

CONTENT: あっ しまむらだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, it's Shimamura.

CONTENT: 日野か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hino.

CONTENT: 何見てんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whatcha lookin' at?

CONTENT: ズバヒュン!　日野は少し地味な見た目を貫く同級生
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Vas a ir al club de tenis de mesa? -Hino es una compañera muy normal.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hino is a classmate who's sort of a plain jane.

CONTENT: 髪は染めたことがないし 万引きしたこともないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca se ha teñido el pelo. Tampoco ha robado nunca.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's never even dyed her hair before. She's never even shoplifted, either.

CONTENT: 他校の女子生徒の髪を引っ張ったこともないそうだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tampoco le ha tirado del pelo a otra chica.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's apparently never pulled the hair of a girl from another school, either.

CONTENT: おーい! まったく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey!

CONTENT: 同じく同級生の永藤は巨乳眼鏡
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nagafuji, mi otra compañera, es la típica con gafas y tetas grandes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My other classmate, Nagafuji, is your usual bespectacled girl with big boobs.

CONTENT: 他に説明いるのって感じだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Need I say more?

CONTENT: 胸の大きさと比例するように 態度も大人びていて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sus pedazo de tetas y su actitud son bastante maduras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her big boobs and her big attitude make her pretty mature...

CONTENT: ただし ちょっとバカだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...but she's a bit dumb.

CONTENT: 日野 自然なセクハラに対する 言い訳を述べよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hino, ¿qué excusa tienes para ese descarado acoso sexual?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hino, do you have an excuse for that blatant sexual harassment?

CONTENT: 永藤が気にしすぎだからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nagafuji is too self-conscious,

CONTENT: 緊張をほぐしてやろうと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: lo hice para levantar los ánimos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I thought I'd lighten the mood.

CONTENT: そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really?

CONTENT: 大きいと まあ　男子の視線は集まるよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que unas tetas tan grandes dejan embobados a los tíos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, when they're this big, the boys always look.

CONTENT: 気になるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course, I'm self-conscious.

CONTENT: 同じ教室の男子は永藤のおっぱいを想像の中で10回はもんでいると思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Fijo que los tíos de clase que te las han mirado han soñado mil veces con tocártelas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure all the boys in class staring at your boobies have fondled them at least ten times in their minds.

CONTENT: うええー!それは 気持ち悪いな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! That's gross.

CONTENT: 有名税みたいなもんだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ese es el precio de la fama.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's the price you pay for being famous.

CONTENT: おっと 間違え... テヘッ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Anda, se me ha resbalado la mano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, whoops. My hand slipped.

CONTENT: 日野と永藤は幼なじみらしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hino y Nagafuji son amigas desde que eran pequeñas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Apparently, Hino and Nagafuji have been friends since they were little.

CONTENT: 私は高校に入ってから知り合ったので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo me hice amiga de ellas cuando entramos en el insti,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I became friends with them after we got into high school,

CONTENT: 友人といえども距離感が異なる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que no tengo tanta confianza con ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so my distance with them varies.

CONTENT: ただ 距離っていうのは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But when it comes to distance,

CONTENT: 一概に近ければいいというものでもない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ser íntimas no es siempre la mejor opción.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: being as close as you can be isn't always the best option.

CONTENT: 近すぎれば反発して　すれ違うことだってある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ser tan amigas puede dar lugar a peleas y malentendidos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you get too close, you might fight and have misunderstandings.

CONTENT: そういえばこの前 釣り堀でさ　宇宙服を着た...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El otro día vi a alguien vestido con un traje espacial en la zona de pesca...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. The other day at the fishing hole there was someone in a spacesuit...

CONTENT: ほら あれを見ろ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, look over there!

CONTENT: 人付き合いとは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think relationships with others

CONTENT: 素潜りだと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: are like free diving.

CONTENT: さっきの誰だっけ?　教室で見たよね 4月くらいに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quién era? ¿No lleva en nuestra clase desde abril?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, who was that? Wasn't she in our class in like April?

CONTENT: お前 あいつ見かける度にそう言ってるよな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Siempre dices lo mismo cuando la ves.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You say that like every time we see her.

CONTENT: あいつは安達 同級生
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Se llama Adachi. Está en nuestra clase.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her name is Adachi. She's our classmate.

CONTENT: 立派な不良だよね 教師公認
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues, según los profes, es toda una delincuente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's definitely a certified delinquent. Teacher-approved.

CONTENT: へえー しまむらの仲間?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is she one of yours, Shimamura?

CONTENT: さあねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who knows?

CONTENT: 深く深く沈んで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You keep sinking deeper and deeper,

CONTENT: 様々なものが周りからなくなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y lo que te rodea empieza a desaparecer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and things start disappearing around you.

CONTENT: 息苦しくなったあと また 海面を目指す
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando te cuesta respirar, intentas volver a la superficie.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You struggle to breathe, so you try to get back to the water's surface.

CONTENT: そして 海面に顔を出して一呼吸したら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces, sacas la cabeza para respirar
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And then you poke your head out for a breath of air

CONTENT: 再び深く潜っていく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: before sinking deeper yet again.

CONTENT: そんなことを繰り返していれば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you keep repeating that cycle...

CONTENT: おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Morning.

CONTENT: 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi...

CONTENT: よっ! 今日は遅かったね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, you're late today.

CONTENT: あ... いや もう帰ろうと思ったんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, es que... había pensado en irme a casa,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I... ...thought I'd just head home,

CONTENT: 一応... ピンポン球の音も聞こえたし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero escuché el sonido de una pelota.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but I heard the sound of a ping-pong ball.

CONTENT: いたね 昨日
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I saw you yesterday.

CONTENT: うん いたね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, you did.

CONTENT: カバンは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where's your school bag?

CONTENT: 自転車のかごの中
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En la cesta de mi bici.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In my bicycle's basket.

CONTENT: そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: じゃ 帰るわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I'm heading home.

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay...

CONTENT: あのさ 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say, Adachi.

CONTENT: 今日授業受けようと今日一緒に帰ろうならどっちがいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entre \"vamos a clase\" o \"volvamos juntas a casa\", ¿cuál prefieres?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Let's go to class today,\" or \"Let's walk home together today.\" Which would you prefer?

CONTENT: えっ その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Um...

CONTENT: じゃあ学校が終わるまで どっか行って　適当に時間潰す かな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En ese caso, creo que iré a pasar el rato por ahí hasta que se acaben las clases.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In that case... I'll just go kill some time somewhere until school's over... I guess.

CONTENT: お待たせ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry to keep you waiting.

CONTENT: でも ポーズまで同じじゃなくてもいいんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tenías que sentarte como el otro día.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You didn't have to be sitting the same exact way.

CONTENT: ごめん 雨降っちゃった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry, it started raining.

CONTENT: 雨はしまむらのせいじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, the rain's not your fault.

CONTENT: しまむらの家って どっち?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which way is your house, Shimamura?

CONTENT: こっち
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This way.

CONTENT: ああ やっぱりか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I thought so.

CONTENT: 持ってて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here, hold this.

CONTENT: いや 私の家と方角がだいぶ違うなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me suponía que tu casa quedaba lejos de la mía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just figured your house was pretty far from mine.

CONTENT: 私は こっちだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I live this way.

CONTENT: で どっちの家から帰る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, whose home should we go home to first?

CONTENT: 斬新な質問だねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Qué forma tan original de decirlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's a novel way of putting it.

CONTENT: じゃあ 安達の家からでいいんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te parece que vayamos primero a la tuya?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then... Why don't we go to your place first?

CONTENT: 分かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay.

CONTENT: 2人乗りは悪いことなんだぞー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sabes que montar así en bici es un delito, ¿verdad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Riding a bike like this is a crime, you know?

CONTENT: いいじゃん 不良なんだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like that matters. We're delinquents.

CONTENT: それもそうだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good point.

CONTENT: いやー不良って お得だね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Man, being delinquents rules.

CONTENT: ホント ホント
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure does.

CONTENT: しまむらって友達いたんだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I guess you actually have friends.

CONTENT: えっ? あっ日野と永藤のこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Oh, you mean Hino and Nagafuji?

CONTENT: いないから あんなところにいるのかなって思ってた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creía que ibas arriba porque no tenías amigos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought you were always up there because you didn't have friends.

CONTENT: 安達は? 友達いる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about you, Adachi? Do you have friends?

CONTENT: しまむらくらいかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que tú eres la única.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're probably my only one.

CONTENT: せめえー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's so sad!

CONTENT: 学校の外で時間を潰してから一緒に帰るって　やっぱり変だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es raro pasar tiempo fuera del insti y luego irnos juntas a casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Killing time outside of school and then going home together is weird.

CONTENT: 絶対に変だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is definitely weird,

CONTENT: その提案が何となく面白くて 高揚して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero la idea sonaba interesante y alegre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but the idea sounded amusing and elating.

CONTENT: これで どっちかが優等生で生真面目だったら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If either of us were actually honor students, we'd say,

CONTENT: いけないよ こんなの とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"We shouldn't be doing this!\"

CONTENT: 友情に熱く燃えて正道に立ち返らせるんだろうけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Además usaríamos la amistad para llevar a la otra por el buen camino.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And try to steer the other back down the right path with the power of friendship,

CONTENT: 私達はどちらも不真面目だからなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sin embargo, las dos éramos unas irresponsables.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but we were both pretty irresponsible.

CONTENT: むしろ深みに はまっていく感じだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So we were just dragging each other down deeper.

CONTENT: ここから こうで 家まで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tiro por aquí y luego... para volver a casa...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I go through here, and then... to get back to my house...

CONTENT: 歩いたら 結構あるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's a pretty decent walk.

CONTENT: しまむらー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura!

CONTENT: えっと まずタオル
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here, I got you a towel.

CONTENT: サンキュー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks.

CONTENT: ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry.

CONTENT: うん?何が?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? About what?

CONTENT: 遠回りさせて悪かったなあって思った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me siento mal por hacerte volver por el camino largo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I feel bad for making you take a really long way home.

CONTENT: 送って行こうか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Want me to give you a ride home?

CONTENT: いやいや 意味ないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. Entonces, este viaje no habría tenido sentido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? No. This whole ride would be pointless, then.

CONTENT: それもそうだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess you have a point.

CONTENT: じゃあね 帰る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, I'm going home.

CONTENT: うん 多分 また明日
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, I'll probably see you tomorrow.

CONTENT: 自転車の後ろで安達の頭を見下ろしたとき
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando miraba la cabeza de Adachi desde la bici,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When I looked down at Adachi's head from the back of her bicycle,

CONTENT: 顔とセットで見るとキレイに見えるそれも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: me fijé en lo bien que le quedaba el pelo con la cara.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I noticed her hair that usually looked so pretty with her face

CONTENT: 毛むくじゃらの生きものに見える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: also looked like some floofy creature.

CONTENT: 私も 似たようなものかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe I looked the same way.

CONTENT: 変な一日だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a weird day.

CONTENT: ほら2階で音してるじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Lo ves? Te dije que los ruidos vienen de arriba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See? I told you there were noises coming from upstairs.

CONTENT: へえーやっぱ卓球してたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué? Sabía que estabas jugando al tenis de mesa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? I guess you really were playing table tennis.

CONTENT: うげっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gack.

CONTENT: うげっとはなんだ友人に向かって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you really say, \"Gack\" to your friend?

CONTENT: ぬぬっ しまむらー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura...

CONTENT: 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi...

CONTENT: で 何で ここが?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, how'd you know I was here?

CONTENT: 本屋で卓球の本見てたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por el libro que viste en la tienda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You were looking at the table tennis book at the bookstore.

CONTENT: あらら...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whoopsie.

CONTENT: で あちらにいらっしゃるのは安達さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So... Is that Adachi over there?

CONTENT: えっとどっからどう見ても 安達だねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... I think that's pretty self-explanatory, but yeah.

CONTENT: そうそう 安達さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup, Adachi.

CONTENT: 友達だったの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You guys were friends?

CONTENT: うん まあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, yeah.

CONTENT: じゃあ 昨日...　いや まっいっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces, lo de ayer... Bueno, déjalo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then yesterday... Well, whatever.

CONTENT: 永藤です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm Nagafuji.

CONTENT: 日野です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm Hino.

CONTENT: 永藤に日野 覚えたよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nagafuji and Hino... Got it.

CONTENT: ひっ!よろしく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice to meet you.

CONTENT: えっと パン買ってきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... I bought us some bread.

CONTENT: でも 体育の授業のときよくバレないね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me sorprende que no os hayan pillado en Educación Física.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm surprised they never found you guys during PE class.

CONTENT: 授業があるときは静かにしてたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando tienen clase nos quedamos calladas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We stayed pretty quiet whenever there was class.

CONTENT: 安達は何がいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which one do you want, Adachi?

CONTENT: しまむらの好きなやつでいいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El que más te guste, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll take whichever one you like, Shimamura.

CONTENT: うーん じゃあ...これで ほいっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm... In that case... Here!

CONTENT: しまむら 日曜日空いてる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you free on Sunday, Shimamura?

CONTENT: 今週の? まあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This week? I think so.

CONTENT: じゃあさ 釣り堀来ない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres ir a la zona de pesca?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then wanna go to the fishing hole?

CONTENT: この間話した宇宙服着た子　面白いヤツだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El niño del traje espacial es la monda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That kid in the spacesuit I was telling you about is a riot.

CONTENT: それって結局釣りに誘ってるだけじゃないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Me estás pidiendo que vaya a pescar contigo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you basically just asking me to go fishing with you?

CONTENT: いやいや そっちはおまけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, no, eso es un extra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, no. That's just a bonus.

CONTENT: しまむらの話したら 会ってみたいって言ってたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando te mencioné, dijo que quería conocerte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They said they wanted to meet you when I mentioned you.

CONTENT: 永藤を連れて行けばいいのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué no te llevas a Nagafuji?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't you just take Nagafuji with you?

CONTENT: 私 部活ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have club.

CONTENT: というわけで 行こうぜー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come on, let's go!

CONTENT: うーん まあ いっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm... Yeah, sure.

CONTENT: よっしゃ よっしゃ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heck yes!

CONTENT: そんじゃ 日曜は釣り堀ねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues quedamos en ir a la zona de pesca el domingo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, we're going to the fishing hole on Sunday.

CONTENT: 次の日　安達は ここに来なかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al día siguiente, Adachi no vino.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The next day, Adachi didn't come here.

CONTENT: 安達について知らないことは山ほどあって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Había muchas cosas que no sabía de ella
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There was a lot I didn't know about Adachi,

CONTENT: 時々 それを歯がゆく思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y eso me frustraba a veces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and that frustrated me at times.

CONTENT: 多少なりとも分かってるのは自分のことだけだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo que sí sabía era lo que sentía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What I did know was what I felt.

CONTENT: 昨日 ここでわいわい にぎやかにしていた日野と永藤を見てつくづく感じ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Después de ver a Hino y Nagafuji pasándoselo bien ayer, me di cuenta...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: After seeing Hino and Nagafuji having a blast up here yesterday, I realized again...

CONTENT: ああいうのは求めていないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: de que eso no era lo que quería.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not what I wanted.

CONTENT: もしかすると安達はずっと来ないかもしれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que Adachi no aparezca por un tiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi might not show up again for a while.

CONTENT: 運が悪ければ卒業まで顔を合わさないこともあり得る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si no tengo suerte, puede que no la vea hasta la graduación. Es posible.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I was super unlucky, I may not see her again until graduation. That was totally possible.

CONTENT: 運が悪いのか　そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess my luck does suck. Welp...

CONTENT: あ... 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-Adachi?

CONTENT: ごめん 止まるつもりだったんだけど　間に合わなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdona. He intentado frenar, pero no lo he conseguido a tiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry... I was planning to stop but didn't make it in time.

CONTENT: どーんって言ったんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty sure I heard you say, \"Blammo.\"

CONTENT: あれ? いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, are you sure about this?

CONTENT: 何が?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: About what?

CONTENT: 安達の家 こっちじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu casa no está por aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, your house isn't this way.

CONTENT: そうだけど うん そうなる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, but... Yeah, you're right.

CONTENT: しまむら これ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura, here.

CONTENT: はい? 何なに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Wait, what?

CONTENT: 今日のお昼に渡そうかと思ったんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pensaba dártelos hoy durante el almuerzo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was going to give them to you during lunch today.

CONTENT: 昼休み? ああ 次か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lunch? Oh, so this is \"next time.\"

CONTENT: しまむらが 他の友達と帰ってなくてよかったよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me alegra que no te hayas ido con tus otras amigas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm glad you weren't going home with your other friends.

CONTENT: 渡しそびれるところだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De haberlo hecho, no te lo habría dado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wouldn't have been able to give them to you.

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: ううん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, nothing.

CONTENT: 安達は友達が私しかいないと言っていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi dijo que yo era su única amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi had said that I was her only friend.

CONTENT: つまりそういうことなんだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess that's all there is to it then.

CONTENT: 今の私が聞けて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era todo lo que podía pedir
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This was about all I could ask

CONTENT: 今の安達が認められるのはきっと これぐらい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y era todo lo que Adachi estaba dispuesta a decir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and this was all Adachi was able to say right now.

CONTENT: 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi.

CONTENT: 私の家まで一緒だよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You are walking me all the way home, right?

CONTENT: うん そのつもり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, that was my intention.

CONTENT: 飛行機のマネ ぶーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look at me! I'm a plane! Vroom!

CONTENT: かすかな高揚感が私に翼を与えた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La pequeña alegría que sentí me dio alas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The slight elation that I felt had given me wings.

CONTENT: 恥ずかしがるまで あと何歩かかるだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuánto quedará para que esto dé vergüenza?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder how many steps it'll take before embarrassment sets in.

CONTENT: 安達さんってさどんな人?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, what's Adachi like?

CONTENT: どんなって　普通?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is she like? Um, normal?

CONTENT: 説明になってないよ しまむーちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso no me aclara nada, mi querida Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That explains nothing, my dear Shimamura.

CONTENT: うーんどこまで話していいものか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y yo no sé cuánto puedo contar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know how much I should tell you.

CONTENT: 安達は水が好きで 飲み物は大体ミネラルウォーター
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le gusta el agua y normalmente bebe agua mineral.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi likes water and usually drinks mineral water.

CONTENT: 銘柄にこだわりはなさそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She doesn't seem to care about brands.

CONTENT: なるほど 安達さんは ナメック星人だったと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. So Adachi is a Namekian.

CONTENT: 腕が生えるのは見たことないけどね あと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero todavía no he visto que le hayan crecido las extremidades...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I haven't seen her regrow any limbs yet, though. Also...

CONTENT: 釣れますかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anything biting?

CONTENT: 場違いにも程がある真っ白さ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El traje era tan blanco que combinaba con su extraña presencia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The spacesuit was so white that it just compounded their awkward presence.

CONTENT: そこに立っていたのは 小さな宇宙飛行士だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De repente se plantó ante mí un pequeño astronauta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suddenly, a small astronaut stood before me.

CONTENT: あだしまペディア ピンポン
卓球とピンポンの違いを述べよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Diferencias con el tenis de mesa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Explain the difference between table tennis and ping-pong.

CONTENT: 本気でやるのが卓球 遊びでやるのがピンポン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El tenis de mesa es serio, no por diversión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When you're playing seriously, it's table tennis. Ping-pong is just for fun.

CONTENT: 本気のピンポンは?　もはや 卓球だろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y el ping-pong serio? -Es tenis de mesa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But what about when you play ping-pong seriously? Then it's table tennis.

CONTENT: 遊びの卓球は?　普通にピンポンだろ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y el tenis de mesa por diversión? -¡Es ping-pong!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But what about table tennis for fun? Then it's just ping-pong!

CONTENT: ピンポンとは卓球である
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ping-pong is but table tennis. Huh?
